docs.snippet: Chinese swimmer Ning Zetao has said his preparations are in full swing for the Rio Olympics and has assured fans he will be going to the Games following social media reports that he will be cut from the team for undertaking too many commercial eng...
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese swimmer Ning Zetao has said his preparations are in full swing for the Rio Olympics and has assured fans he will be going to the Games following social media reports that he will be cut from the team for undertaking too many commercial engagements.

headline.main: Chinese Swimmer Ning Assures Fans Over Rio
headline.print_headline: Chinese Swimmer Ning Assures Fans Over Rio

docs.snippet: A move to improve relations with athletes by giving their sponsors more leeway may not sit well with companies that pay millions for official status....
docs.lead_paragraph: A move to improve relations with athletes by giving their sponsors more leeway may not sit well with companies that pay millions for official status.
docs.abstract: Advertising column; loosening of rule that severely restricted advertisements by unofficial sponsors has opened marketing floodgates surrounding Rio Olympic Games; nonofficial sponsors may now create Olympic-related campaigns, so long as they abide by limited set of rules, and several players like Under Armour, Red Bull, Gatorade and General Mills have moved to take advantage.

headline.main: Olympics Ease an Ad Blackout, and Brands Flood the Field
headline.print_headline: Olympics Ease Blackout,  and Brands Flood Arena

docs.snippet: Russell Westbrook is no longer sharing the NBA marquee in Oklahoma City after the Thunder lost much of their identity when free agent Kevin Durant chose to join the Golden State Warriors on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russell Westbrook is no longer sharing the NBA marquee in Oklahoma City after the Thunder lost much of their identity when free agent Kevin Durant chose to join the Golden State Warriors on Monday.

headline.main: Westbrook's Future Next Hurdle for OKC With Durant Leaving
headline.print_headline: Westbrook's Future Next Hurdle for OKC With Durant Leaving
